language.title: Language Setting
language.selectHint: Please select the language for the application

geoRoles.title: Geographical Roles
geoRoles.REGION_WORLD: This role enables a user to query customers from all regions.
geoRoles.REGION_EMEA: This role enables a user to query customers from region Europe.
geoRoles.REGION_AMERICAS: This role enables a user to query customers from region Americas.
geoRoles.REGION_ASIA_PACIFIC: This role enables a user to query customers from region Asia Pacific.
geoRoles.REGION_GREATER_CHINA: This role enables a user to query customers from region Greater China.

sectoralRoles.title: Sectoral Roles
sectoralRoles.SECTOR_ALL: This role enables a user to query customers from all sectors.
sectoralRoles.SECTOR_ID: This role enables a user to query Distribution customers.
sectoralRoles.SECTOR_OEM: This role enables a user to query OEM/MRO customers.
sectoralRoles.SECTOR_IA: This role enables a user to query customers allocated to sector Industrial Automation.
sectoralRoles.SECTOR_OR: This role enables a user to query customers allocated to sector Offroad.
sectoralRoles.SECTOR_PT: This role enables a user to query customers allocated to sector Power Transmission.
sectoralRoles.SECTOR_RM: This role enables a user to query customers allocated to sector Raw Materials.
sectoralRoles.SECTOR_RV: This role enables a user to query customers allocated to sector Railway.
sectoralRoles.SECTOR_TW: This role enables a user to query customers allocated to sector Two Wheelers.
sectoralRoles.SECTOR_WE: This role enables a user to query customers allocated to sector Windenergy.
sectoralRoles.SECTOR_XA: This role enables a user to query customers allocated to sector Aerospace.

costRoles.title: Cost Roles
costRoles.COST_GPC: This role enables a user to see GPC and margin information.
costRoles.COST_SQV: This role enables a user to see SQV information.

priceRoles.title: Price Manual
priceRoles.PRICE_MANUAL: This role enables a user to enter a manual price (ZMAN).

contactInformation:
Please contact ServiceNow if you have questions about your user roles or need access to additional user roles.
